attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is obvious from sites such as the BBC 'Have Your Say' message board that a huge majority of people want a General Election to give a new Parliament a chance to change Britain for the better. Gordon Brown is seen as inept, and has little support - even from Labour voters. His reputation as a tax money waster will never go away. The people are calling for him to go - and surely the people should be listened to in a Democracy

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
